author: WHO
title: Nepal vaccinates over 1.46 million girls with the HPV vaccine
description: Nepal has vaccinated over 1.46 million girls, through a nationwide HPV campaign, supported by Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance, WHO and UNICEF, achieving 94% administrative coverage.

author: Kathmandu University
title: Kathmandu University Opens Health Informatics Affiliation
description: KU invites private colleges across Nepal to apply for affiliation in Bachelor in Health Informatics and other programs by June 24, 2025.

author: RC
title: AI in Nepali Healthcare: A Real Breakthrough
description: A real case study of reducing unplanned hospital admissions with early alerts.
